extraDescription: A business Analyst is required to support the options assessment and implementation of the Social Security Tribunal Electronic Initiative project. The resource will create business documentation based on the business needs
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100001775 dated May 08, 2014. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
